body:
SELECT  MIGI.UrtMiktar_Kg, T.TOPlam, * From IT210_MuhasebeGunlukImalat MIGI 
INNER JOIN (
	SELECT GCM.MuhasebeAktarimCikanID, TOPlam =  SUM(GCM.Miktar_Kg) From IT07_GerCikanMalzeme GCM GROUP BY MuhasebeAktarimCikanID
) T ON T.MuhasebeAktarimCikanID = MIGI.MuhasebeAktarimCikanID
WHERE T.TOPlam <> MIGI.UrtMiktar_Kg AND (MIGI.UrtMiktar_Kg- T.TOPlam) > 1

ORDER BY MIGI.Tarih
